title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 7, pt. 484 - Development And Improvement Of Community Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 7, pt. 484 - Development And Improvement Of Community Facilities

State Regulations
§ 484.1 - Fees and charges in connection with mortgage financing

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 7, pt. 484

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 410-m; Private Housing Finance Law, §364

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
